data.name: ChooseTemplate.Title
data.value: Choose a Template for your site

data.name: Template.Help
data.value:
The Site Provisioning Wizard provides an Administrator with a User-Friendly way to set up the more common features of a Portal.

You can step through the Wizard using the Next/Back buttons at the bottom of the Wizard Page.

Once enough detail has been collected to complete the Wizard, the Finish Button will be enabled.

You can optionally choose to build your site from a preexisting template. To choose a template click the checkbox to enable the list of templates, and choose a template from the list.

If you elect to build your site using a template, you need to choose how to deal with duplicate Modules (Modules that are in the Template and also already on your site).

data.name: lblTemplateTitle.Text
data.value: Choose a Template:

data.name: lblTemplateTitle.Help
data.value: You can optionally choose to build your site from a preexisting template. To choose a template click the checkbox to enable the list of templates, and choose a template from the list.

data.name: TemplateDetail.Text
data.value: Build your site from a template (below)

data.name: MergeDetail.Text
data.value: Choose how to deal with duplicate Modules (Modules that are in the Template and also already on your site).

data.name: Ignore.Text
data.value: Ignore

data.name: Replace.Text
data.value: Replace

data.name: Merge.Text
data.value: Merge

data.name: MergeWarning.Text
data.value: Note: If you choose "Replace", all existing content on pages that are also in the template will be lost.

data.name: TemplateRequired.Text
data.value: You must select a Template before you can proceed.

data.name: InvalidTemplate.Text
data.value: {0} is not a valid Portal Template File.

data.name: ChooseSkin.Title
data.value: Select a Skin for your Site

data.name: lblSkinTitle.Text
data.value: Select a Skin:

data.name: lblSkinTitle.Help
data.value: Select a Skin from the Skin Viewer. This skin will be applied to all pages in your site.

data.name: SkinDetail.Text
data.value: Select a Skin from the Skin Viewer (below)

data.name: Skin.Help
data.value: You can select a Skin from the Skin Viewer. This skin will be applied to all pages in your site. However, when you edit the Page properties you will have the ability to override this default skin with a different one.

data.name: ChooseContainer.Title
data.value: Choose a Default Container for your site

data.name: lblContainerTitle.Text
data.value: Select a Container:

data.name: lblContainerTitle.Help
data.value: Select a Container from the Container Viewer. This container will be applied to all modules on all pages in your site.

data.name: ContainerDetail.Text
data.value: Select a Container from Viewer:

data.name: Container.Help
data.value: You can select a Container from the Container Viewer. This container will be applied to all modules on all pages in your site. However, when you edit the Module properties you will have the ability to override this default container with a different one.

data.name: Details.Title
data.value: Add Site Details

data.name: lblDetailsTitle.Text
data.value: Site Details:

data.name: lblDetailsTitle.Help
data.value: In the section provide some basic information about your site.

data.name: DetailsDetail.Text
data.value: Provide some basic information about your site.

data.name: lblPortalName.Text
data.value: Name/Title:

data.name: lblPortalName.Help
data.value: The site Name will display in the TitleBar of the Browser.

data.name: lblDescription.Text
data.value: Description:

data.name: lblDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a description for your site

data.name: lblKeyWords.Text
data.value: KeyWords:

data.name: lblKeyWords.Help
data.value: Enter some keywords for your site (separated by a comma).

data.name: Details.Help
data.value:
On this page you can provide some basic information about your site.

You can optionally provide a Description and Keywords that help describe your site. These are used by search engines, together with the site's name to help identify and index your site.

The keywords need to be separated by commas.

data.name: Logo.Title
data.value: Choose a Logo

data.name: lblLogoTitle.Text
data.value: Choose a Logo:

data.name: lblLogoTitle.Help
data.value: Select a logo for your site.

data.name: lblLogo.Text
data.value: Logo:

data.name: lblLogo.Help
data.value: Select a Logo.

data.name: Logo.Help
data.value:
Some skins support a Logo, usually in the top left hand corner. If you are using a skin that supports logos you can choose it on this page.

If the file you would like is not on this site, you can upload one from your local computer.

data.name: SuccessMessage.Text
data.value:
Your Site has been successfully configured.

If you changed the skin for your site, it should change when you leave the Wizard by selecting Home.

data.name: ControlTitle_.Text
data.value: Site Wizard

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About Site Wizard

The Administrator can use this user-friendly wizard to set up the common features of the Portal/Site.

data.name: IncludeAll.Text
data.value: Show All Containers:
